text: Nan pen pheraawa brrda rx sul khxng phwk khea di mayang phwk khea phrxm dwy hlakthan xan chad cæng tæ phwk khea di klaw wa samay chn chen ni na hrux ca chinæa thang hı kæ rea phwk khea di ptiseth sraththa læa phinhlanghı tæ xallxhˌ thrng phx pheiyng (cak kar sraththa khxng phwk khea) phe raaxallxhˌ pen phuthrng mangmi xyang heluxhlay pen phuthrng di rab kar srrseriy
